description:
Path Copy Copy is a Windows Explorer extension that adds entries to the contextual menu shown for files and folders, allowing the user to copy the item's name or path in a variety of formats.  Idea copied from "Path Copy".

Works on Windows XP or later.

![The Path Copy Copy contextual menu items](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/clechasseur/pathcopycopy@e934954b1577fc21d904b77184c78574ef47c16a/screenshots/PathCopyCopyContextualMenu.png)
summary: Copy file paths from Windows explorer's contextual menu
author: clechasseur
